entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
